title: Haptik
description: “Haptik is the one app every Indian must have on their phone” - The Times of India, NDTV, Economic Times, Business Standard, and others Haptik is a 24x7 Chat-based Personal Assistant to set reminders, book flights, trains, cabs, pay your bills and find anything nearby. It’s a one stop shop for all your needs, and lets you focus on more important tasks.
